scripts.build-local: react-scripts build; rm -rf cm-api/cmail; mv build cm-api/cmail; touch cm-api/cmail/.gitkeep; mkdir -p releases; rm -rf releases/cranberrymail; rm -f releases/cranberrymail-web-$npm_package_version.zip; git archive -o releases/cranberrymail-web-$npm_package_version.zip HEAD:cm-api; unzip releases/cranberrymail-web-$npm_package_version.zip -d releases/cranberrymail; rm -f releases/cranberrymail-web-$npm_package_version.zip; chmod -R 755 releases; cd releases/cranberrymail; chmod 644 index.php; mkdir -p storage/logs; chmod -R 775 storage; chmod -R 775 bootstrap ; cd .. ;zip -r cranberrymail-web-$npm_package_version.zip cranberrymail; rm -rf cranberrymail;
scripts.build: react-scripts build && rsync -va build/* cm-api/cmail && mkdir -p releases/cranberrymail && rm -f releases/cmail_installer.zip && cd cm-api && cp -r . ../releases/cranberrymail && cd ../releases && rm -rf cranberrymail/cmail_settings/* rm -rf cranberrymail/cmail_settings/.env* && mkdir -p cranberrymail/storage/framework/cache cranberrymail/storage/framework/sessions cranberrymail/storage/framework/views && zip -q -r cmail_installer.zip cranberrymail && rm -rf cranberrymail
scripts.clean: rm -rf build; rm -f releases/cranberrymail-web-$npm_package_version.zip; rm -rf cm-api/cmail; mkdir -p cm-api/cmail; touch cm-api/cmail/.gitkeep
